Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to service retirement benefits for members of the NYC police pension fund
Summary: Provides that service retirement benefits for members of the NYC police pension fund shall not be reduced by the primary social security retirement benefit commencing at age sixty-two.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to service retirement benefits for members of the New York city police pension fund
